amendment.description: Amendment numbered 8 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to require the Federal Communications Commission, in consultation with the United States Department of Agriculture, to establish a task force for reviewing the connectivity and technology needs of precision agriculture in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Latta amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Latta.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Latta amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
